mapper.insert: insert into place (place_id, place_name, latitude, longitude, address, phone) values (#{placeId}, #{placeName}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{address}, #{phone})
mapper.select: select place_id, place_name, latitude, longitude, score_sum, score_count, address, phone from place where score_count != 0 order by (score_sum / score_count) desc limit 10
SELECT place_id, place_name, latitude, longitude, score_sum, score_count, address, phone FROM place p WHERE place_id IN ( SELECT pit.place_id FROM place_in_theme pit WHERE pit.theme_id = #{themeId} )
mapper.insert: insert into place_in_theme (theme_id, place_id, editor_id) values (#{themeId}, #{placeId}, #{editorId})
mapper.update: update place set score_sum = score_sum + #{score}, score_count = score_count + 1 where place_id = #{placeId}
